lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What were the people of earth like in the days of Noah?
answers: All they thought about was doing evil
They were all kind and generous
They worshiped God faithfully every day
They were just okay

questions.text: How did God feel about their sin? What did he plan to do?
answers: Sad, he planned to destroy the earth
Happy, he planned to bless everyone
Confused, he didn't know what to do
Scared and frightened of his sinful people

questions.text: What does the book of Genesis say about Noah?
answers: He was a godly man who was faithful to God
He was the strongest man who ever lived
He was afraid of the water
He was very handsome

questions.text: What did God tell Noah to do? Why?
answers: To build an ark because he would flood the earth
To build a giant tower to reach the sky
To move to a new land and start a city
To fight a giant

questions.text: Who was going to be in the ark with Noah?
answers: His family, male and female of every animal
Only Noah and his sons
Everybody in the whole world
Only animals, but no people

questions.text: What promise/covenant did God give to Noah?
answers: To keep his family and the animals safe in the ark
To give him great riches and a kingdom
To give Noah really big muscles
To stop all rain from ever falling again

questions.text: How did Noah get two of every animal in the ark?
answers: God brought the animals to him
Noah searched the earth and caught them himself
Noah spoke in the language of the animals
The animals followed Noah because he played music

questions.text: How did God flood the earth?
answers: Sent rain for 40 days, great springs opened up in the deep
Sent giant waves from space
Made snow fall until it covered the earth
Caused a huge windstorm that lasted a year

questions.text: How high did the waters of the flood rise?
answers: Above the mountains of the earth
Just high enough to cover the trees
Only ankle-deep across the land
All the way to the moon

questions.text: What happened to the animals and people not in the ark?
answers: They died
They climbed tall mountains and survived
They hid in caves and waited out the flood
They swam until the flood went away
